ValidationRule.description: If the Marketing case is Status of Existing Order from Printer, then Order Number and Printer Fields are required.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL( Subtype__c, "Status of Existing Order from Printer" ), ISBLANK( Order_Number__c ), ISBLANK( TEXT(Printer__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Order Number and Printer fields are required for Status of Existing Order from Printer cases
